Name: system_interacting_protein_chains_atom_count
Description: List of number of atoms of each interacting protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_interacting_protein_chains_average_b_factor
Description: List of average b-factor of each interacting protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_interacting_protein_chains_average_occupancy
Description: List of average occupancy of each interacting protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_interacting_protein_chains_average_rscc
Description: List of mean Real-Space Correlation Coefficient of each interacting protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_interacting_protein_chains_average_rsr
Description: List of mean Real-Space R-value of each interacting protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_interacting_protein_chains_average_rsrz
Description: List of mean RSRZ of each interacting protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_interacting_protein_chains_heavy_atom_count
Description: List of number of heavy atom count of each interacting protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_interacting_protein_chains_max_alt_count
Description: List of maximum number of configurations across all residues in each interacting with all ligands in a system.

Name: system_interacting_protein_chains_num_processed_residues
Description: List of fraction of residues processed in the validation file in each interacting ligand chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_interacting_protein_chains_num_unresolved_heavy_atoms
Description: The number of unresolved heavy atoms across all residues in each interacting ligand chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_interacting_protein_chains_percent_occupancy_over_threshold
Description: The fraction of residues with full occupancy in each interacting protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_interacting_protein_chains_percent_outliers_chirality
Description: The fraction of chirality outliers (see https://www.wwpdb.org/validation/XrayValidationReportHelp) in each interacting protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_interacting_protein_chains_percent_outliers_clashes
Description: The fraction of clash outliers (see https://www.wwpdb.org/validation/XrayValidationReportHelp) in each interacting protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_interacting_protein_chains_percent_outliers_density
Description: The fraction of density outliers (see https://www.wwpdb.org/validation/XrayValidationReportHelp) in each interacting protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_interacting_protein_chains_percent_outliers_geometry
Description: The fraction of geometry outliers (see https://www.wwpdb.org/validation/XrayValidationReportHelp) in each interacting protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_interacting_protein_chains_percent_processed_residues
Description: The fraction of residues processed in the validation file in each interacting protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_interacting_protein_chains_percent_rscc_over_threshold
Description: The fraction of residues with RSCC >= 0.8 in each interacting protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_interacting_protein_chains_percent_rsr_under_threshold
Description: The fraction of residues with RSR <= 0.3 in each interacting protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_neighboring_protein_chains_atom_count
Description: The number of atoms in each neighboring protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_neighboring_protein_chains_average_b_factor
Description: The mean B-value of each neighboring protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_neighboring_protein_chains_average_occupancy
Description: The fraction of residues with full occupancy in each neighboring protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_neighboring_protein_chains_average_rscc
Description: The mean Real-Space Correlation Coefficient across all residues in each neighboring protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_neighboring_protein_chains_average_rsr
Description: The mean Real-Space R-value across all residues in each neighboring protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_neighboring_protein_chains_average_rsrz
Description: The mean RSRZ across all residues in each neighboring protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_neighboring_protein_chains_heavy_atom_count
Description: The number of heavy atoms in each neighboring protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_neighboring_protein_chains_max_alt_count
Description: The maximum number of configurations across all residues in each neighboring protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_neighboring_protein_chains_num_processed_residues
Description: The number of residues which were processed in the validation report for each neighboring protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_neighboring_protein_chains_num_unresolved_heavy_atoms
Description: The number of unresolved heavy atoms across all residues in each neighboring protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_neighboring_protein_chains_percent_occupancy_over_threshold
Description: The fraction of residues with full occupancy in each neighboring protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_neighboring_protein_chains_percent_outliers_chirality
Description: The fraction of chirality outliers (see https://www.wwpdb.org/validation/XrayValidationReportHelp) in each neighboring protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_neighboring_protein_chains_percent_outliers_clashes
Description: The fraction of clash outliers (see https://www.wwpdb.org/validation/XrayValidationReportHelp) in each neighboring protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_neighboring_protein_chains_percent_outliers_density
Description: The fraction of density outliers (see https://www.wwpdb.org/validation/XrayValidationReportHelp) in each neighboring protein chain for all ligands in a system

Name: system_neighboring_protein_chains_percent_outliers_geometry

Name: system_pocket_atom_count
Description: The number of atoms from each of the pocket residues of a system

Name: system_pocket_average_b_factor
Description: The mean B-value of each of pocket atoms of a given system

Name: system_pocket_average_occupancy
Description: The fraction of pocket atoms with full occupancy in a given system

Name: system_pocket_average_rscc
Description: The mean Real-Space Correlation Coefficient across all pocket residues in a given system

Name: system_pocket_average_rsr
Description: he mean Real-Space R-value across all pocket residues in a given system

Name: system_pocket_average_rsrz
Description: The mean RSRZ across all pocket residues in a given system

Name: system_pocket_heavy_atom_count
Description: List of number of pocket heavy atom count in a given system

Name: system_pocket_max_alt_count
Description: The maximum number of configurations across all pocket residues in a given system

Name: system_pocket_num_processed_residues
Description: The number of pocket residues which were processed in the validation report in a given system

Name: system_pocket_num_unresolved_heavy_atoms
Description: The number of unresolved heavy atoms all pocket residues in a given system

Name: system_pocket_percent_occupancy_over_threshold
Description: The fraction of pocket residues with full occupancy in a given system

Name: system_pocket_percent_outliers_chirality
Description: The fraction of pocket residues with chirality outliers (see https://www.wwpdb.org/validation/XrayValidationReportHelp) in a given system

Name: system_pocket_percent_outliers_clashes
Description: The fraction of pocket residues with clash outliers (see https://www.wwpdb.org/validation/XrayValidationReportHelp) in a given system

Name: system_pocket_percent_outliers_density
Description: The fraction of density outliers (see https://www.wwpdb.org/validation/XrayValidationReportHelp) in a given system

Name: system_pocket_percent_outliers_geometry
Description: The fraction of geometry outliers (see https://www.wwpdb.org/validation/XrayValidationReportHelp) in a given system

Name: system_pocket_percent_processed_residues
Description: The fraction of pocket residues processed in the validation file in a given system

Name: system_pocket_percent_rscc_over_threshold
Description: The fraction of pocket residues with RSCC >= 0.8 in a given system

Name: system_pocket_percent_rsr_under_threshold
Description: The fraction of residues with RSR <= 0.3 in a given system

Name: system_pocket_unknown_residue_count
